pkgmetadata.longdescription: Regression Trees with Random Effects for Longitudinal (Panel) Data // A data mining approach for longitudinal and clustered data, which combines the structure of mixed effects model with tree-based estimation methods. See Sela, R.J. and Simonoff, J.S. (2012) RE-EM trees: a data mining approach for longitudinal and clustered data doi:10.1007/s10994-011-5258-3.
